about.title: About me
about.p1: Write some information about yourself that is IT related. Why are you passionate about coding? What is your source of inspiration for improving your programming skills?
about.info1: Where are you located? Are you open to different ways of working, such as working remotely or even relocating?
about.info2: Show that you are open-minded. Are you enthusiastic about learning new technologies and continually improving your skills?
about.info3: A brief description of your problem-solving approach. Do you learn from each challenge as you search for the most efficient or elegant solution? You can include some keywords like analytical thinking, creativity, persistence and collaboration.

skills.title: My skills
skills.p1: I have experience in implementing projects with various front-end technologies and agile methodologies.
skills.p3: I am enthusiastic about learning new technologies and frameworks to stay on the cutting edge.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.intro: Here is a selection of my projects. Feel free to check them out and test the applications.

contact.title: Contact
contact.intro: Have a question or want to work together? Send me a message!
